items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in the correct chronological order in the chat window
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
non_functional: System should handle at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Video call connection is established within 3 seconds after initiation
Video and audio streams remain synchronized with latency under 200ms
Users can end the call at any time and return to the chat interface
non_functional: Support HD video quality with adaptive bitrate
Secure transmission of audio and video data

notes: Assumed that the application will support both web and mobile platforms; group video calling not specified so only one-to-one video calls are included.
